titleStmt.title: A declaration of the most Christian King, Louis the XIIIth. [sic] King of France and Navarre. Declaring the reasons wherefore His Majesty hath prohibited all trade with England Also that he hath given commission to raise an army for the assistance of the King of England.
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1643-1715 : Louis XIV)
Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715.

notesStmt.note: The declaration is actually by Louis XIV.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
